short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create, send and track quotes, proposals, contracts and other collateral from within Nutshell CRM using PandaDoc extension!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create, send and track quotes, proposals, contracts and other collateral from within Nutshell using PandaDoc extension!

Turn Nutshell opportunities into revenue faster

Intelligently merge Nutshell data into beautiful sales docs within seconds

With PandaDoc + Nutshell you can: 

- Create, deliver, track and legally eSign quotes, proposals and contracts with speed and efficiency.
- Autofill accurate pricing, product, and profile data into actionable and engaging documents -- directly from Nutshell lead records!
- Track opens and views on your sales collateral.
- Convert eSignatures faster with stunning HTML5 documents that are accessible via any browser or device.
- Work faster with pre-designed templates, drag-and-drop content, shared workspaces.
- Collaborate in real-time to complete negotiations faster.

Learn more at www.pandadoc.com
